{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-2-02-2015-03-02222-0-000001650", "text": "UN/UNE PHYSIOTHERAPEUTE à 70%

Emplois
Fonction : physiothérapeute

Taux d'activité : 70%
Permis :
Entrée en fonction : 1er février 2015

Profil :

Située dans la région de Vevey, la Cité du Genévrier accueille près de 180 résidents adultes grâce à l’investissement et à la motivation de plus de 330 collaborateurs. Afin de compléter notre service thérapeutique, nous cherchons pour le 1er février 2015
UN/UNE PHYSIOTHERAPEUTE à 70%

Nous vous invitons à intégrer une équipe pluridisciplinaire dynamique de thérapeutes, dans laquelle 6 métiers sont représentés, au sein d’une Institution en pleine évolution. Vous collaborerez avec l’équipe pour offrir un accompagnement en physiothérapie destiné à une population avec handicap mental et/ou physique. L’orthopédie et la traumatologie viennent enrichir le travail sur le maintien ou le développement des acquis, sur le soulagement et la prévention de douleurs aigues ou chroniques.

La tenue à jour des dossiers (bilans, facturation, caisse maladie, AI) fait aussi partie des tâches de ce poste.

Vous êtes un(e) physiothérapeute diplômé(e) et le handicap mental est un domaine que vous connaissez ou pour lequel vous avez de l’intérêt. Vous avez une capacité de remise en question, un esprit d’ouverture, un intérêt pour le travail pluridisciplinaire et savez allier la mise en œuvre du geste technique et de la qualité relationnelle de vos échanges.

Nous offrons un travail riche et varié dans un cadre attractif, des échanges professionnel stimulants, de participer au développement d’une importante institution du canton, la chance de relever des défis et d’être créatif, de prendre part à des projets et, par le biais de formations internes, de développer vos compétences.

Ce poste s’adresse indifféremment aux candidatures féminines et masculines. Nous attendons votre offre complète avec curriculum vitae, photo, copies de diplômes et de certificats à l’adresse suivante : Cité du Genévrier, ressources humaines, 1806 St-Légier. [wwwadr]"}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-2-02-2015-03-02402-0-000000385", "text": "Data Mining Consultant (Business Analyst) (m/w) 100%

Data Mining Consultant (Business Analyst) (m/w) 100%
Im Bereich Customer Analytics suchen wir Verstärkung. Arbeitsort: Zürich Oerlikon. 

Aufgaben
Planen und Durchführen aller Prozessschritte wie Profilanalyse, Entwicklung von Affinitäts-Scores, Test-Design, Selektion, Back-end Analyse usw. sowie Aufbereitung der Analyseresultate im Rahmen des Loyalty Kampagnen Management Prozesses.
Aufbereiten von lead-spezifischen Pre-Sales Unterlagen wie bspw. Potentialanalysen zur Unterstützung der Vertriebs-Aktivitäten zur Gewinnung neuer Loyalty-Partner. Dies beinhaltet auch das fallweise begleiten des Vertriebs bei Kundenbesuchen.
Unterstützen des Marketings sowie des Loyalty Departments aus der Perspektive der Datenanalyse. Zum Beispiel beim Design von Kampagnen und der korrekten Interpretation von Analyseresultaten.
Mithilfe bei der Pflege einer Wissensdatenbank im Bereich der Entwicklung von Prognosemodellen.
Mithilfe bei der Sicherstellung einer adäquaten Qualität des Kundendatenbestandes.
Kontinuierliches Weiterentwickeln der Richtlinien und Vorgaben zur Sicherstellung eines qualitativ hochstehenden Data Mining Prozesses.
Unterstützen der Weiterentwicklung der analytischen CRM Umgebung und der Prozesse insbesondere im Bereich Kampagnen Management.
Profil 
Sie haben ein Hochschulstudium in Physik, Mathematik oder ähnlichem abgeschlossen und verfügen über fundierte Kenntnisse in Statistik insbesondere im Bereich der Anwendung von Data Mining Methoden. Idealerweise bringen Sie zusätzlich Know-how im Bereich der Software-Entwicklung  sowie Data Warehousing mit und können erste Projektmanagement-Erfahrungen vorweisen. Zudem können Sie sich in Deutsch als auch Englisch in Wort und Schrift gewandt ausdrücken. Ihre Intuition für das Machbare und Sinnvolle, gepaart mit sehr guten analytischen und konzeptionellen Fähigkeiten, erlauben Ihnen, in Zusammenarbeit mit den Fachbereichen mit viel Freude und Elan komplexe Fragestellungen aus dem Direkt Marketing Bereich zu bearbeiten und so an der stetigen Verbesserung der Marketing Services mitzuarbeiten. 

Chancen
In unserer Unternehmensgruppe arbeiten Sie in einem dynamischen und kreativen Arbeitsumfeld mit guten Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten. Wir pflegen eine offene und unkomplizierte Kultur und bieten unseren Mitarbeitenden nebst gründlicher Einführung, attraktiven Anstellungsbedingungen und fortschrittlichen Lohnnebenleistungen auch weitreichende Entscheidungskompetenzen. 

Nehmen Sie an unserer Erfolgsgeschichte teil und bewerben Sie sich online mit Ihren vollständigen Bewerbungsunterlagen bei: 

Aduno Gruppe
Diana Vidale
Human Resources Management
Über eine Million Kunden vertrauen der Aduno Gruppe beim bargeldlosen Zahlen, bei Privatkrediten und bei Leasinggeschäften. Über 750 qualifizierte Mitarbeitende setzen sich mit wegweisenden Dienstleistungen und Technologien für die Zufriedenheit der Kunden und Partner ein. [wwwadr]

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-2-02-2015-03-02716-0-000001643", "text": "PhD Position in Machine Learning

PhD Position in Machine Learning

PhD position in Machine Learning
Laboratory for Information and Inference Systems

Our Laboratory for Information and Inference Systems ([wwwadr]) led by Prof. Volkan Cevher at Ecole Polytechnique Federale de Lausanne (EPFL) is currently looking for a PhD student in Machine Learning. Topic of the theses: “Guaranteed accuracy for machine learning models of materials compound space”.

The high-throughput screening of large databases of novel materials candidates constitutes a central goal of the recently awarded MARVEL NCCR grant. Given a training set of compounds with pre-calculated quantum mechanical properties, we seek to construct supervised machine learning models that accurately infer the corresponding properties for similar materials with correctness guarantees.

Our lab provides a stimulating, collaborative and fun research environment with state-of-the-art facilities at EPFL. Personal initiative and independent research tasks related with the candidate’s interests will be encouraged. Other activities will include interaction with Ms students and participation in teaching.

The working language at LIONS is English.

Starting date: as soon as possible

Candidates should apply online, via the online application form, directly to the doctoral programs of EDIC or EDEE and the supplications should include a detailed CV, transcripts of diplomas as well as at least two letters of reference. It is your responsibility to ensure that your application (including recommendations) is fully completed before the relevant deadline.
For more details please check: [wwwadr]

For informal enquiries, please contact Gosia Baltaian [email] 

Redited 29.01.2015 sbt"}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-3-01-2015-03-09001-0-000003334", "text": "Kundenberater/in im Versicherungsaussendienst

Die Allianz Gruppe gehört zu den größten und renommiertesten Finanzdienstleistern der Welt und bietet ein internationales Netzwerk bekannter Marken mit erstklassigen Produkten. Wir bieten umfassende Lösungen in den Bereichen Nichtleben- und Lebensversicherung sowie im Bereich von Anlageprodukten für Privat- und Unternehmenskunden.

Vertrauen ist die Basis für unseren Erfolg - mit viel Engagement, Leidenschaft und Kompetenz sind unsere Mitarbeitenden im Aussendienst an insgesamt 130 Standorten in der Schweiz flächendeckend für unsere Kunden da. Um als vertrauenswürdiger Partner in Versicherungs- und Vorsorgefragen den Bedürfnissen unserer Kunden vor Ort noch besser gerecht zu werden, bauen wir unseren Aussendienst weiter aus.

Sind Sie in der Nordostschweiz regional verwurzelt, haben Erfahrung in der Versicherungsbranche, Freude am Netzwerken und suchen eine spannende Aufgabe in Ihrer Heimat, dann suchen wir Sie für unsere Generalagenturen in SH, TG, SG, AR, AI, GR & FL als
Kundenberater/in im Versicherungsaussendienst für die Ostschweiz
Ihre Aufgaben

	Sie kümmern sich eigenverantwortlich um den Ausbau und die Pflege des Ihnen übertragenen Kundenstammes im Vorsorge- und Versicherungsbereich.
	Sie finden gemeinsam mit Ihrem Kunden die für ihn beste Lösung und legen Wert auf langfristige und vertrauensvolle Kundenbeziehungen.
	Sie nützen Ihre Kreativität und Ihre Kontakte zur Gewinnung von neuen Kunden für Ihren Bestand.
	Sie nutzen die gebotenen Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten, um Ihren Kunden jederzeit die beste Beratung bieten zu können.

Ihr Profil

	Sie haben eine abgeschlossene Berufslehre, einige Jahre Berufserfahrung und sind über 25.
	Sie gehen gerne aktiv auf Menschen und Aufgaben zu.
	Sie bringen ein hohes Mass an Eigeninitiative mit.
	Ihre selbstständige Arbeitsweise zeichnet Sie aus.
	Sie legen Wert darauf, dass sich Ihr persönlichen beruflicher Erfolg in Ihrer Entlöhnung widerspiegelt.

Haben Sie Fragen? Susanne Dachs, Telefon +41 58 358 8348, gibt Ihnen gerne weitere Auskünfte über die Stelle. Interessiert? Informieren Sie sich auf [wwwadr]

Schon entschlossen? Dann freuen wir uns auf Ihre Bewerbung. Ihre Unterlagen nehmen wir sehr gerne auch online oder per Mail ([email]) entgegen.
Allianz Suisse, Frau Susanne Dachs, Distribution / Zentrales Recruting, Bleicherweg 19, 8022 Zürich"}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-3-01-2015-03-09001-0-000008679", "text": "Java Software Engineer (Professional oder Senior)

Top Jobs for Telecoms, IT and other Professionals

Über uns
Home

JAVA Engineer in national und international tätiger, erfolgreicher Firma in Bern

Unsere Kundin ist ein international tätiger Anbieter von Beratungs- und Systemintegrationsdienstleistungen, welcher sich mit einem ganzheitlichen Beratungsportfolio auf die Kernthemen Customer Performance Management, Business Intelligence, E-Business, und Customer Relationship Management spezialisiert hat. Zur Verstärkung des Entwicklungsteams in Bern suchen wir mehrere, engagierte Persönlichkeiten (m/w) als

Java Software Engineer (Professional oder Senior)

Aufgaben:
Als erfahrener Java-Software-Entwickler unterstützen sie die Kunden beim Bau individueller und spannender Lösungen in allen Projektphasen   von der Anforderungsanalyse über Konzeption, Architektur, Design und Implementation bis zum Deployment. Der Schwerpunkt Ihrer Tätigkeit liegt dabei auf Entwurf und Implementierung von Software-Applikationen auf der Basis von Java-Plattformen (Java SE/EE/Spring).

Sie sind Java-Software-Entwickler und

	verfügen über eine grosse Erfahrung in der Gestaltung und Entwicklung von Java-Applikationen
	sind vielseitig und fühlen sich sowohl in der Spring- als auch der JEE-Welt zu Hause
	lieben es, in dynamischen Teams effiziente und robuste Systeme zu realisieren
	verstärken gerne auch die Entwicklungsteams bei unseren Kunden
	wollen zusammen mit dem Kunden auch mal Anforderungen erarbeiten
	wissen den Wert tragfähiger Software-Architekturen zu schätzen
	suchen den aktiven Wissensaustausch in einem Team von Experten
	sind neugierig auf neue Technologien und deren Integration in bestehende Systeme

Anforderungen:

	höhere Ausbildung in der Informatik (Uni, FH)
	mehrjährige praktische Erfahrung als Java-Entwickler
	umfassende Kenntnisse der verbreiteten und im Java Ökosystem eingesetzten Frameworks (z.B.  JPA2, JSF2, JAX-WS, JAX-RS, JEE 5/6/7, Spring 3/4, usw.)
	gute Kenntnisse der Web-Grundlagen (HTTP(S), HTML5, CSS, JavaScript)
	idealerweise haben Sie Kenntnisse in einem Web-Framework wie AngularJS, Twitter Bootstrap usw.
	sichere Anwendung einer Tool-Chain (Git, Subversion, Maven, Jenkins, Sonar, JIRA, Confluence)
	Erfahrung im Umgang mit Applikationsservern (Apache Tomcat, Glassfish, usw.)
	Erfahrung mit bekannten Vorgehensmethoden (Hermes, UP, Scrum, Kanban, usw.)
	Eigeninitiative und Teamgeist
	Gute Deutsch- und Englisch-Kenntnisse

Unsere Kundin befindet sich auf starkem Wachstumspfad, welchen Sie in einem motivierten Team weiter entscheidend mitgestalten und prägen können. Das Unternehmen fordert und fördert Weiterbildung und offeriert Ihnen abgestimmte Zertifikatslehrgänge und/oder Nachdiplome. Die Kernelemente ihres Erfolges sind die Expertise und langjährige Erfahrung ihrer Mitarbeiter, die Nähe zu den Kunden, rasche und unkomplizierte Entscheidungswege, flache Hierarchien und die gelebte Firmenkultur. Falls Sie mehr über dieses attraktive Angebot erfahren möchten, dann registrieren Sie sich online oder senden uns bitte Ihre kompletten Unterlagen per Email an Herrn Daniel von Deschwanden ([email]).

r 30013627

	swisselect ag bern
Herr Daniel von Deschwanden
Senior Consultant
Monbijoustrasse 30
CH - 3011 Bern

Tel.: +41 (0)31 388 1818
Fax: +41 (0)31 388 1810
E-Mail: [email]
Internet: [wwwadr]

	Ihre Auswahl:

	Drucken

	Onlinebewerbung

Weiterempfehlen:

© swisselect ag, ch-3011 bern, switzerland"}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-3-01-2015-03-09001-0-000011926", "text": "Software-Ingenieur

Hapa ® Swiss Printing Technologies
Die Hapa AG ist der international führende Anbieter von innovativen Drucklösungen für
Verpackungsprozesse. Hapa entwickelt und produziert vorwiegend für die Pharmaindustrie sowie
für die Bereiche Medizinaltechnik, FMCG und Lebensmittelindustrie. Als stetig wachsendes
Schweizer KMU beschäftigt Hapa über 150 Mitarbeitende am Hauptsitz in Volketswil nahe Zürich
und in eigenen Vertriebs- und Servicestellen auf der ganzen Welt. Das Unternehmen gehört zur
privaten italienischen Unternehmensgruppe Coesia mit Sitz in Bologna, Italien.
Software-Ingenieur FH/Uni (m/w)
Verantwortung: Sie entwickeln als Teil unseres Teams Software zur Druckmaschinenbedienung in
.NET. Dank Ihrer Leidenschaft für Software und neue Technologien fällt es Ihnen leicht, funktionale
Anforderungen und Automatisierungsprozesse geeignet umzusetzen. Ebenfalls integrieren Sie
Software in bestehende Kundensysteme. Dabei zielen Sie auf kontinuierliche Verbesserungen
durch optimierte Arbeitsprozesse. Sie arbeiten aktiv an der Neuentwicklung eines webbasierten
HMI mit und unterstützen dabei zeitgleich die Programmierung unserer Maschinensoftware.
Kompetenzprofil: Sie haben eine Ausbildung zum Informatik- oder Elektrotechnik- Ingenieur
abgeschlossen und besitzen vertiefte Kenntnisse in .NET und C#. Sie denken und arbeiten
lösungsorientiert und verfügen über ausgeprägte analytische Fähigkeiten. Bei Ihren gelegentlichen
Einsätzen bei unseren Kunden und Vertriebspartnern im In- und Ausland überzeugen Sie mit
stilsicheren Englischkenntnissen in Wort und Schrift.
Um sich von anderen Profilen abzuheben, verfügen Sie idealerweise über Fachwissen in C++,
Python, Webtechnologien (JavaScript, HTML) und praktische Erfahrung in der Erstellung von
automatischen Integrations- und Unit-Tests. Mit Ihrer Erfahrung in einem ähnlichen Berufsumfeld
überzeugen Sie uns vollständig.
Angebot: Sie haben in dieser Position die Möglichkeit, mit modernsten Technologien ein neues
System zur Druckmaschinenbedienung und Prozessautomatisierung aktiv mitzugestalten. Es wird
Ihnen eine umfassende Einarbeitung und Schulung geboten. AIs Arbeitsumfeld bietet Ihnen die
Hapa AG einen schönen, hellen und zeitgemässen Arbeitsplatz sowie Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten
und Talentprogramme in einem erfolgreichen Wachstumsmarkt. Flache Hierarchien und ein
angenehmes Arbeitsklima runden unser Angebot ab.
Ambitionierte Studienabgänger mit kurzer Berufs- oder Praktikumserfahrung und mit Kenntnissen
in den erwähnten Programmiersprachen werden ebenfalls berücksichtigt.
Haben wir Ihr Interesse geweckt? Dann freuen wir uns auf Ihre Bewerbungsunterlagen
ausschliesslich in elektronischer Form. Für Fragen stehen wir Ihnen gerne zur Verfügung.
Kontakt: Hapa AG, Frau Sulamit Guidon, Human Resources, Chriesbaumstrasse 4, 8604
Volketswil. Bewerbung an: [email]."}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-3-01-2015-03-09017-0-000028796", "text": "Senior Strategic Sourcer – Audit & Tax

Senior Strategic Sourcer – Audit & Tax
Credit Suisse - Zürich
Vor 5 Stunden veröffentlicht
Weitere Informationen
Werden Sie Mitglied, um sich zu bewerben

Bereits Mitglied bei LinkedIn? Anmelden
Über diese Stelle
Stellenbeschreibung
We Offer...

A challenging role in the ‘Sourcing & Vendor Management (SVM) Department'. This department is responsible for sourcing and promoting closer working relationships between the department, with business partners and key vendors in order to collectively provide more efficient and commercially valued sourcing and vendor management services as well as mitigate commercial, contractual and reputational risk to the bank
The Audit Relationship Management Team supports the Audit Committee (AC) and Chief Accounting Officer (CAO) in the management of and execution of responsibilities in respect if the external auditors including the monitoring of independence requirements and fees.
The tax sourcing works with senior stakeholders to execute the efficient and effective sourcing of external support for tax requirements and drive the vendor strategy across tax.
Preparation of and support meetings with Audit Committee chairman and CAO.
Leading requests for proposal with external vendors for financial ,regulatory and fund audits, other assurance and tax services
Negotiating of the scope and fees for mandates in audit and tax and related contract execution
Building strong relationships with the audit and other vendor firms, with a focus on the Big4 Audit firms, prepare and manage Supplier Relationship Management meetings including spend analysis and benchmarking of service levels
Research and analysis on market and regulatory changes impacting the audit or governance over audit firms, such as changes in the independence requirements, auditor rotation and quality review requirements.
Monitoring of auditor independence against CS policy and SEC auditor independence rules and assessment of potential conflicts of interest
Service monitoring and facilitation of solutions if service issues arise
Possibility for home office in accordance with other team members, deadlines and agreement with team lead

You Offer...

University degree in Accounting, Finance or similar. Audit, financial consulting or legal background, ideally qualified account
6 years or more experience in a financial consulting or similar environment or within a professional services sourcing role
A good understanding of the financial services/banking industry, with insight of the Swiss regulatory environment and the vendor market for Audit and Tax services
A flair for negotiating and understanding of pricing models and costs drivers
Strong influencing and relationship skills to build effective collaborations with internal stakeholders, external vendors and external auditor partners
Proven track record of working in a multi-tasking, international environment with an ability to work effectively cross border
Proficient project management and organisational skills
Knowledge of the standard legal/contracting terminology and typical key terms and conditions
Fluent communication skills in English and, preferred in German

Ms F.Kieffer (HLOD 24) would be delighted to receive your application:

Please apply via our career portal.

EEO Statement

Credit Suisse is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate in its employment decisions on the basis of any protected category.

To the extent permitted or required by applicable law, a candidate who is offered employment will be subject to a criminal record check and other background checks.
Über dieses Unternehmen
Founded in 1856, Credit Suisse can call upon a long tradition and many years of experience in the banking business. It provides companies, institutional clients and high-net-worth private clients worldwide, as well as retail clients in Switzerland, with advisory services, comprehensive solutions, and excellent products. Credit Suisse is active in over 50 countries and employs more than 48,000 people from approximately 100 different nations."}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-3-01-2015-03-09017-0-000029480", "text": "Senior Managing Consultant - Regulatory and ...

Senior Managing Consultant - Regulatory and Implementation in Life Sciences
IBM - Zürich
Vor 3 Tagen veröffentlicht
Weitere Informationen
Werden Sie Mitglied, um sich zu bewerben

Bereits Mitglied bei LinkedIn? Anmelden
Über diese Stelle
Stellenbeschreibung
IBM is one of the world leaders in IT Services and business consultancy. Our vision is to bring a new level of ‚smart‘ to how the world works. A place where people, businesses, governments, objects and systems all work, talk, listen and understand each other. A place where billions of people will live and work better.

IBM Global Business Services (GBS) is the world's largest consulting services organization. GBS provides clients with business transformation and industry expertise, and the ability to translate that expertise into integrated, responsive, innovative business solutions. GBS provides consulting services across multiple industries and covers the whole process chain from strategy consulting through to the construction, implementation and operation of technical and commercial solutions.

Are you ready to participate in the next wave of strategic transformation in Life Sciences? And to drive new strategies with our top Life Science clients? IBM is using new approaches to tackle some of humanity's most challenging problems. This results in fundamental shifts like how doctors research cancer or how Life Science businesses engage with their customers.

As a member of our Life Science consulting team you'll work closely with our clients to clarify regulatory challenges, develop initiatives and drive business process innovation to maximize customer value. With your focus on regulatory services you'll help our clients to transform their organizations and realize benefits.

In your role as a Senior Regulatory consultant you'll be part of a growing and exciting business which brings your career to the next level. You'll support go-to-market activities and project delivery in providing Regulatory solution assessments and recommendations with respect to training, staffing, organizational structure, standards, processes, tools and technologies.

You'll interact with senior stakeholders from our leading Life Science clients and be seen as as a trusted advisor based on your industry and consulting expertise.

Join IBM and you'll have a rewarding career and make a positive impact on the Life Science industry.

(1468)

Required

	Bachelor's Degree
	At least 6 years experience in Pharmaceutical industry consulting with focus on computer systems validation, business analysis, quality assurance and system development lifecycle methodologies/principles.
	At least 6 years experience in knowledge of FDA, ISO, GxP, IEEE, GAMP, 21 CFR Part 11, 210, 211, 820 and other international regulatory authorities. Coding certification/knowledge of CPT/HCPCS and ICD-9 coding preferred
	At least 6 years experience in software implementation, qualification, validation, remediation of analytical data or enterprise resource planning systems
	At least 3 years experience in leading and managing complex technology driven projects with tangible results, working across organizational boundaries, and interfacing with senior client stakeholders
	English: Fluent
	German: Fluent

Preferred

	Master's Degree

Additional information
We gently encourage women to send their applications. Although the opportunities in education and development are the same as for men, there is a discrepancy of gender quantity in IT companies.

IBM will offer you excellent learning and training opportunities, interaction with clients with challenging responsibilities on local and international projects. Furthermore IBM offers unmatched career growth and development opportunities.

Please, don't hesitate to send your complete application documents online. We are looking forward to meeting you.

IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.
Über dieses Unternehmen
IBM is a global technology and innovation company headquartered in Armonk, NY. It is the largest technology and consulting employer in the world, with more than 400,000 employees serving clients in 170 countries. IBM offers a wide range of technology and consulting services; a broad portfolio of middleware for collaboration, predictive analytics, software development and systems management; and the world's most advanced servers and supercomputers. Utilizing its business consulting, technology and R&D expertise, IBM helps clients become "smarter" as the planet becomes more digitally interconnected. This includes working with organizations and governments to build systems that improve traffic congestion, availability of clean water, and the health and safety of populations. IBM invests more than $6 billion a year in R&D, just completing its 18th year of patent leadership. IBM Research has received recognition beyond any commercial technology research organization and is home to 5 Nobel Laureates, 9 US National Medals of Technology, 5 US National Medals of Science, 6 Turing Awards, and 10 Inductees in US Inventors Hall of Fame. The company was behind the inventions of the PC; SABRE travel reservation system; UPC codes, Watson, the Jeopardy!-playing computing system, and much more."}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-3-01-2015-03-09017-0-000029708", "text": "Wintel / Citrix Technical Server Specialist

Wintel / Citrix Technical Server Specialist
IBM - Zürich
Vor 6 Tagen veröffentlicht
Weitere Informationen
Werden Sie Mitglied, um sich zu bewerben

Bereits Mitglied bei LinkedIn? Anmelden
Über diese Stelle
Stellenbeschreibung
IBM is one of the world‘s largerst providers of information technology solutions and business consultancy. Our vision is to bring a new level of ‚smart‘ to how the world works. A place where people, businesses, governments and systems are interconnected and work together. A place where billions of people will live and work better.

IBM Global Technology Services (GTS) is the world's leading IT services provider. GTS combines industry experience and leading technology expertise to improve the competitive position of companies of every size and industry. IT services range from consulting to design, hosting and the complete operation of IT infrastructures and business processes.

IBM's SO Delivery, Platform Support - Intel SG team, is seeking Technical Support Specialist responsible for providing server support for problem and change tickets surrounding the Wintel/Citrix infrastructure. Incumbent assesses situation to determine problem facing the client. Problems are not routine or standardized and the creation of documentation explaining the solution to the problem is required. Responsible for implementing changes to the client's environment. Incumbents are also responsible for mentoring and training other team members and work for 24x7 standby services, which can only handled in Switzerland.

Primary Job Responsibilities:
Support problem and change tickets for server support operations for work involving problem determination and implementation of changes to hardware or os.
These tasks consist of the most complex and non standard work and require independent thought and problem solving to resolve
Work with QA and Dispatcher to resolve identified green team/QA investigations
Mentor and train other team members
Work to standardize repeatable tasks and steps across multiple accounts within a pool
Team members participate once or more a day in cadence discussion on team performance. They discuss issues or challenges, and receive trouble-shooting input /advice from other team members. They may also discuss team performance trends. Team members may also separately interact and exchange information with members of cross-pool teams.
Facilitate or engage in problem solving to create a continuous improvement culture

Required

	Bachelor's Degree
	At least 3 years experience in System Administration within Windows Server and VMware Environments
	At least 3 years experience in installing, troubleshooting, operating, testing, planning and configuring relevant technologies
	At least 3 years experience in System Administration within Citrix Server
	Certified in Windows Server System Administration
	Certified in VCP VMware Certified Professional
	Certified in Certified Citrix Environment
	English: Intermediate
	German: Fluent

Additional information
We gently encourage women to send their applications. Although the opportunities in education and development are the same as for men, there is a discrepancy of gender quantity in IT companies.

IBM will offer you excellent learning and training opportunities, interaction with clients with challenging responsibilities on local and international projects. Furthermore IBM offers unmatched career growth and development opportunities.

Please, don't hesitate to send your complete application documents online. We are looking forward to meeting you.

IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.
Über dieses Unternehmen
IBM is a global technology and innovation company headquartered in Armonk, NY. It is the largest technology and consulting employer in the world, with more than 400,000 employees serving clients in 170 countries. IBM offers a wide range of technology and consulting services; a broad portfolio of middleware for collaboration, predictive analytics, software development and systems management; and the world's most advanced servers and supercomputers. Utilizing its business consulting, technology and R&D expertise, IBM helps clients become "smarter" as the planet becomes more digitally interconnected. This includes working with organizations and governments to build systems that improve traffic congestion, availability of clean water, and the health and safety of populations. IBM invests more than $6 billion a year in R&D, just completing its 18th year of patent leadership. IBM Research has received recognition beyond any commercial technology research organization and is home to 5 Nobel Laureates, 9 US National Medals of Technology, 5 US National Medals of Science, 6 Turing Awards, and 10 Inductees in US Inventors Hall of Fame. The company was behind the inventions of the PC; SABRE travel reservation system; UPC codes, Watson, the Jeopardy!-playing computing system, and much more."}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-1-01-2016-03-06206-0-000000825", "text": "Directeur (rice) général (e) de la fondation

[bild] alfaset
La Fondation alfaset a pour mission d'offrir des prestations
d'accompagnement et d'hébergement, ainsi que des postes
de travail adaptés à des personnes en situation de handicap,
pour leur permettre d'améliorer leurs conditions morales, sociales
et matérielles, favorisant ainsi leur intégration dans la société.
Subventionnée par l'Etat de Neuchâtel, la fondation bénéficie
d'un personnel spécialisé dans les domaines social et
technique, d'ateliers industriels et de foyers résidentiels à
La Chaux-de-Fonds, à Neuchâtel et à Couvet, accueillant plus
de 600 collaborateurs valides ou en situation de handicap.
La fondation met au concours le poste de
Directeur (rice) général (e) de la fondation
Mandat:

	•  assurer la responsabilité opérationnelle globale de la fondation;

	•  promouvoir et développer les prestations de la fondation dans une
perspective cohérente et dynamique;

	•  favoriser une culture d'entreprise;

	•  entretenir et développer un réseau utile à l'activité de la fondation avec
les milieux sociaux, les partenaires industriels et les pouvoirs publics;

	•  développer l'image de la fondation en général et plus particulièrement
celle des ateliers;

	•  être responsable du respect de la qualité de vie, de l'encadrement, de la
santé et de la sécurité de tous les collaborateurs, valides et en situation de
handicap;

	•  animer l'équipe de direction dans le but d'assurer la bonne marche
des trois départements (fabrication, accompagnement social et
administration);

	•  garantir le respect de la mission;

	•  veiller à l'établissement et au respect des budgets d'exploitation et
d'investissement, dans le cadre des consignes du Conseil de Fondation et
des autorités de subventionnement.
Profil demandé:

	•  Etre au bénéfice d'une formation supérieure de niveau HES, universitaire
ou jugée équivalente;

	•  pouvoir faire valoir une expérience réussie dans la conduite du personnel;

	•  justifier d'une expérience importante dans un des domaines caractéristiques
	de la fondation, industriel ou social, et démontrer une sensibilité
pour l'autre;

	•  avoir une compétence reconnue dans la conception, l'organisation et le
suivi de projet;

	•  jouir d'une personnalité dynamique, charismatique, communicative et
flexible;

	•  maîtriser les outils bureautiques usuels;

	•  connaissance du management de la qualité (la fondation est certifiée
ISO 9001 : 2008 et OFAS-AI 2000)
Indications complémentaires:

	•  Lieu principal de travail: La Chaux-de-Fonds

	•  Salaire selon la Convention collective de travail des établissements
spécialisés du Canton de Neuchâtel (CCT-ES)

	•  Taux d'occupation: 100%

	•  Entrée en fonction: de suite ou à convenir

	•  Délai de postulation: 31 mars 2016

	•  D'autres informations concernant la fondation se trouvent sur
[wwwadr]
Ce profil est susceptible d'évoluer en fonction de l'évolution des besoins de
la population concernée et du déploiement de l'équipement institutionnel
neuchâtelois.
Il est attendu une offre manuscrite avec curriculum vitae et photo; la
commission de sélection se réserve le droit de demander des références
ainsi qu'une copie des diplômes et certificats, de même qu'un extrait de
casier judiciaire.
Veuillez envoyer votre dossier de candidature à :
alfaset
M. Jerry Simonis
Président du Conseil de Fondation
Rue des Terreaux 48
2303 La Chaux-de-Fonds"}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-2-02-2016-03-00093-0-000001881", "text": "Condition Monitoring Ingenieur/Diagnostiker/in (100%)

Condition Monitoring Ingenieur/Diagnostiker/in (100%)

Über diese Stelle
Standort	Schweiz - Lyss
Funktion	Condition Monitoring Ingenieur (100%)
Bereich	Kundendienst
Organisation	Feintool Technologie AG
Eintrittsdatum	nach Absprache
Beschreibung

Für unseren Remote-Service „FEINmonitoring“ am Standort in Lyss (Schweiz), suchen wir einen 

Ingenieur FH oder Condition Monitoring Diagnostiker (m/w) 100 %
(Maschinenbau, Fahrzeugtechnik, Mikrotechnik, Elektrotechnik)

Ihre Aufgabe ist die Analyse des Maschinenzustandes auf Basis der kontinuierlich übertragenen Daten unserer Maschinen beim Kunden. Dadurch decken Sie problematische Entwicklungen des Maschinenzustandes auf und können Ihren Kunden rechtzeitig Hinweise geben, wie sie den Nutzungsgrad Ihrer Maschine maximieren können.

Als Mitglied in unserem Business Development Team in Lyss sind Sie für unsere Kunden ein kompetenter Ansprechpartner. Für diese Funktion mit regem Kundenkontakt suchen wir eine dienstleistungsorientierte, belastbare Persönlichkeit mit ausgeprägtem kommunikativen Fähigkeiten. Zudem sollten analytisches Denken sowie Problemlösungsorientiertes Arbeiten zu Ihren weiteren Stärken gehören.

Erfahrung als Condition Monitoring Analyst ist erwünscht sowie Kenntnisse in der Datenanalyse und Data Mining bei Industrieapplikationen (Industrie 4.0) oder Sensorik/Messtechnik im Hydraulikbereich.

Diese Stelle eignet sich auch für Studienabgänger mit Vertiefung im Bereich Messtechnik, Condition Monitoring, Data Mining.

Eine interessante und abwechslungsreiche Tätigkeit in einem motivierten Team sowie in einem technisch attraktiven Umfeld mit flexiblen Arbeitszeiten erwarten Sie.

Falls wir Ihr Interesse geweckt haben, freuen wir uns auf Ihre Bewerbung.

Feintool Technologie AG
Frau C. Cauda

HR-Fachfrau mit eidg. Fachausweis
Industriering 3, 3250 Lyss
(Schweiz) 

[email]"}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-2-02-2016-03-00489-0-000003518", "text": "Experienced Big Data & Analytics Consultant

Auto req ID 	11324BR
Title	Experienced Big Data & Analytics Consultant

Job Description 	IBM is one of the world‘s largerst providers of information technology solutions and business consultancy. Our vision is to bring a new level of ‚smart‘ to how the world works. A place where people, businesses, governments and systems are interconnected and work together. A place where billions of people will live and work better.

Driving innovation for our clients is the main mission of our consulting business unit IBM Global Business Services. With major transformation underway around Big Data & Analytics, we are looking for experienced architects to embrace this opportunity with us.

As experienced Big Data Consultant you will be part of our European Big Data & Analytics consulting team where you will be responsible for providing technical thought leadership and solution expertise around emerging Big Data & Analytics technologies. This includes technology assessment, use case development, as well as solution outline and design (conceptual, logical & technical) for modern (big) data & analytics architectures.

We’re looking for experienced technical professionals in the Big Data & Analytics space. You’ll have strong track record across systems integration, information management, business analytics and architecture for innovative & modern big data & analytics solutions. You’ll have more than 10 years of experience in working in a data warehouse & business intelligence environment and you’ll be knowledgeable of traditional and emerging approaches to information management, big data and analytics.

Your key skills include:

	Thorough understanding of the capabilities of commercial Apache Hadoop distributions such as e.g. IBM, Hortonworks, Cloudera, or MapR and their integration options with traditional data warehousing and BI tools (such as e.g. Teradata, IBM DB2 / Netezza / DataStage / Cognos, Informatica, Ab Initio)
	Substantial expertise in Advanced Analytics technologies & solutions (incl. SPSS, SAS, R, Tableau, Qlikview)
	More than 10 years experience in solutioning, designing, estimating, planning and managing Big Data implementation projects
	Strong communication skills and business acumen, including experience in presenting complex information to senior decision makers in a compelling way
	Dedicated industry experience in one of the following industry clusters: Financial Services (Banking or Insurance), Distribution (Consumer Products or Pharma & Life Sciences), Industrial (Energy & Utilities or Manufacturing).

For this role you need to have ability to work in Switzerland.

IBM is market leader in the data & analytics space. We offer a dynamic, innovative and international environment which is fueled by projects with leading clients, unique capabilities such as IBM Research & Development and IBM Watson, and a growing ecosystem of partnerships such as those with Apple and Twitter. If you think you have the skill and the attitude to change the way that business is conducted – IBM is the place for you and will offer you numerous opportunities for growth across the company.
Required Technical and Professional Expertise 	

	At least 10 years experience in in-depth knowledge of the technology and vendor landscape for Big Data & Analytics- including the Hadoop Ecosystem, NoSQL approaches Advanced Analytics, Cognitive Computing and Cloud Data Management
	At least 10 years experience in across systems integration, information management business analytics and architecture
	At least 10 years experience in / of a data warehouse environment and knowledge of existing and emerging data integration approaches
	English: Fluent

Preferred Technical and Professional Experience 	

	At least 5 years experience in solution architecture - experience in traditional information management not limited to SAP BW / HANA
	At least 5 years experience in Big Data - project consulting experience using Hadoop, Map Reduce or NoSql technologies
	At least 5 years experience in integration of Big Data & Analytics to a traditional data architecture
	At least 5 years experience in data architecture - experience of designing and developing logical data models
	At least 5 years experience in design - experience with programming on high-scale or distributed systems (such as Hadoop)
	At least 5 years experience in / with high performance distributed parallel file system storage technology such as GPFS, GFS, CloudStore, HDFS or similar
	At least 5 years experience in /hands-on experience with production-scale Hadoop architectures (incl. YARN, MapReduce, Pig, Hive, HBase. Oozie, Spark)
	German: Fluent

Required Education 	Master's Degree
Preferred Education 	None
Travel Required 	Up to 75% or 4 days a week (home on weekends - based on project requirements)
Is Extensive Time Away From Home Required? 	No
Posting Country 	Switzerland
State / Province 	ZÜRICH
City / Township / Village 	ZÜRICH

EO Statement 	IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

Eligibility Requirements 	None
Primary job category 	Architect
Group ID (R) 	GBS
Growth Play 	None"}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-2-02-2016-03-01074-0-000002178", "text": "Fachfrau/Fachmann für med.-techn. Radiologie 60 - 100%

Gefragte Stellen: Ein Arbeitsplatz bei RODIAG

Die RODIAG-Gruppe ist eine der bedeutendsten Radiologiegruppen in der Schweiz und betreibt mit ca. 120 Mitarbeiter/innen zwölf private Institute. Zusätzlich bestehen interdisziplinäre Zusammenarbeiten mit anderen Fachärzten und öffentlichen sowie privaten Institutionen.

(publiziert am 16.12.2015)

In unserem modernst eingerichteten und volldigitalen Röntgeninstitut in Olten ist zur Ergänzung unseres Teams folgende Stelle per sofort oder nach Vereinbarung zu besetzen:

Fachfrau/Fachmann für med.-techn. Radiologie 60 - 100% 

Diese verantwortungsvolle Aufgabe umfasst ein breites Untersuchungsspektrum mit folgenden Schwerpunkten: MRI (1,5 und 3 Tesla), Multislice-CT, Nuklearmedizin, Ultraschall, DEXA, digitale Radiographie und digitale Mammographie. Alle Geräte haben die höchste Konfigurationsstufe und alle unsere Institute arbeiten mit modernstem RIS, PACS und Spracherkennung.

Wir erwarten eine aufgestellte Persönlichkeit mit fundierten Kenntnissen in allen bildgebenden Verfahren. Einwandfreie Umgangsformen mit Mitarbeiter/innen, Patienten und zuweisenden Ärzten sind für Sie selbstverständlich und runden Ihr Profil ab.

Wir bieten Ihnen eine interessante, abwechslungsreiche und anspruchsvolle Aufgabe in einem motivierten, kollegialen und gut funktionierenden Team. Kein Nacht-, Wochenend- oder Feiertagsdienst.

Haben wir Ihr Interesse geweckt und suchen Sie eine neue Herausforderung? Wir freuen uns auf Ihre Bewerbung.

RODIAG Diagnostic Centers, Susanne Lerch
Personalabteilung, Belchenstrasse 18, 4600 Olten
Telefon: 062 205 12 00
E-Mail: [email]"}

Syngenta is one of the world's leading companies with more than 28,000 employees in over 90 countries dedicated to our purpose: Bringing plant potential to life. Responsibilities:	Syngenta is looking for an Intern in Toll Manufacturing for a period of 12 months. In this role you will:

	•  maintain the detailed AI supply plans across one or more defined tollers and product portfolio, providing options to meet upsides and downsides. Work within a Tactical Supply Plan agreed with the AI SCP.

	•  supervise co-ordination along the supply chain, especially with AI Supply Chain Planner, Vendor Schedulers and Toller to manage the production plan and ex-works shipments over a zero to end current season horizon.

	•  contact with Order Management, AI SCPs, Purchasing/Technical support, Site Production teams, Tollers, Vendor Schedulers
Requirements:

	•  Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain

	•  Advanced capacity planning skills, end to end process.

	•  Experience of the key interfaces within the supply chain.

	•  Understanding Risk Management within the Supply Chain.

	•  Good understanding of Health and Safety and current best practices.

	•  Effective stakeholder & expectation management.

	•  Good interpersonal communication, both written and verbal.

	•  Fluency in English required, ideally additional language like French or German"}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-2-02-2016-03-01432-0-000001901", "text": "Verification Engineer (FW/HW)

Tecan
Drucken | Schliessen

Join Tecan! Join the market leader! Work in an international and dynamic environment, share our success!

Tecan ist ein weltweit führender Anbieter von Laborinstrumenten und Lösungen für die Branchen Biopharma, Forensik und Klinische Diagnostik. Das Unternehmen ist auf Entwicklung, Herstellung und Vertrieb von Automatisierungslösungen für Laboratorien im Life-Science-Bereich spezialisiert.

Wir bieten Ihnen die Gelegenheit im dynamischen Biotech-Umfeld mitzuwirken und dabei aktiv zum Erfolg der Tecan beizutragen. Im Bereich Research & Development am Standort Männedorf suchen wir eine/n innovative/n und exakte/n

Verification Engineer (FW/HW)

In dieser interessanten und herausfordernden Funktion sind Sie für die Unterstützung der Projekte durch Verifikation, Dokumentation und Anpassung von Produkten während des Produkte-Entwicklungsprozess zuständig. Zu Ihren Hauptaufgaben gehört das Definieren von Planungs- und Ausführungsmethoden von Verifikationstests im Rahmen von Entwicklungsprojekten. 

Ausserdem wirken Sie an der Entwicklung von Prüfkriterien (Testspezifikationen) für Firmware- und Hardwarenahe Testobjekte in allen Phasen eines Projektes mit und behalten dabei die Rand- und Rahmenbedingungen stets im Auge. 

Weiterhin sind Sie für den Entwurf und die Validierung von eigens entwickelten Softwaretools zu Verifikationszwecken verantwortlich. Sie zeigen sich aktiv für die Gestaltung und Durchführung von Hardware-nahen Modul- und Instrumententests und deren Arbeitsmethoden verantwortlich.

Ihre Erfahrungen und Persönlichkeit bieten:

	Eine höhere technische Ausbildung wie Ingenieur (FH) oder naturwissenschaftliches Studium
	Ein geschärftes Auge für technische Details & starkes Interesse im Bereich Robotik / Elektronik
	Testerfahrung ISTQB-Advanced Level und Weiterbildung im Bereich Software von Vorteil
	Gute Programmierkenntnisse in C++ / C# und gute Scriptsprachenkenntnisse (LUA)
	Fortgeschrittene Kenntnisse in Testautomatisierung, Datenbankkenntnisse (SQL) von Vorteil
	Gute Elektronikkenntnisse, Kenntnisse des Laborumfeldes von Vorteil
	Sehr gute Deutsch- und Englisch-Kenntnisse in Wort und Schrift

In dieser Funktion bietet sich Ihnen eine interessante Herausforderung innerhalb einer faszinierenden Hightech-Umgebung mit einer offenen und innovativen Unternehmenskultur.

Wir freuen uns auf Ihre Kontaktaufnahme und Bewerbung online. 

Bewerbungen von Personalvermittlern sind willkommen. Registrieren Sie sich bitte unter folgendem Link: [wwwadr]

Tecan Schweiz AG, Seestrasse 103, 8708 Männedorf, [wwwadr]

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-2-02-2016-03-01772-0-000003986", "text": "Computational Scientist for Large-scale 3D CFD, Cellular Automata and Particle Simulation (100%)

The Singapore-ETH Centre for Global Environmental Sustainability (SEC) is a joint initiative between ETH Zurich and Singapore’s National Research Foundation (NRF). SEC launched the Future Cities Laboratory (FCL) as its first research programme in Singapore in September 2010. The FCL undertakes cutting-edge research in disciplines ranging from urban planning, engineering, and environmental technologies to communication technology and architecture. SEC is an equal opportunity and family-friendly employer. All candidates will be evaluated on their merits and qualifications, without regards to gender, race, age or religion. We are recruiting for the interdisciplinary Cooler Calmer Singapore Impact Project per March 1, 2016, or by mutual agreement a
Computational Scientist for Large-scale 3D CFD, Cellular Automata and Particle Simulation (100%)
We are looking for a candidate who is highly motivated and interested in working in an interdisciplinary environment at the interface of urban design and algorithm development for large-scale simulation and data analysis problems. Main tasks include development, analysis, optimisation and trouble-shooting of a broad range of computational models on HPC platforms and advancing the state of the art in micro-scale simulation environments. More specifically, this includes the development of large-scale methods for CFD, cellular automata and particle simulations to emulate heat emissions and their fluctuations within the environment.
The candidate should have a doctoral degree in Computational Science, Computer Science, or a related background. He/she has strong programming experience in C++ and parallel computing (e.g., OpenMPI). Additional experience in high-performance computing, model management, physics engines and game engines (e.g., Nvidia PhysX) are highly beneficial. Experience in the field of urban planning / urban heat island effect is beneficial. Good communication skills and good command of English are essential in order to be eligible for this position. The work place is at the Singapore-ETH Centre in Singapore. The appointment will be initially for a duration of one year with an opportunity for further extension.

For further information please contact Dr. Heiko Aydt by e-mail [email] orDr. Bernhard Klein by e-mail [email]. Please do not send any applications via e-mail.

Applications with a cover letter, a comprehensive CV, list of publications, short statement of experience and qualification (one page) should be submitted online to: ETH Zurich, Mr. Matthias Steiger, Human Resources, CH-8092 Zürich."}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-2-02-2016-03-02133-0-000002058", "text": "2 postes de doctorant-e-s à 100% à l'institut de philosophie

CALL FOR APPLICATIONS
The international consortium of the European Training Network DIAPHORA, funded by the European
Commission under grant agreement H2020-MSCA-ITN-2015-675415 and coordinated by the
University of Barcelona, offers 14 Early Stage Researcher positions in philosophy at predoctoral
level. The positions are for 3 years each, starting 01.10.2016.
DIAPHORA serves as a European research and training platform for collaborative research on the
nature of philosophical problems, their resilience, the resources of persistent divergence of expert
opinion about them, and their relation to conflicts in the practical sphere. It seeks to address these
issues on the basis of first-level research into a number of notoriously hard philosophical problems and
foundational issues in semantics and epistemology.
Each of the 7 consortium members offers 2 positions that are tied to the respective research
workpackage these consortium members lead. Successful applicants are expected to conduct their
doctoral research on topics within the remit of the workpackage to which their position corresponds
(as indicated by workpackage title and more specific areas below). Different faculty offer different
supervision arrangements depending on their expertise in the areas covered by the respective
workpackage.
Expected net salaries vary from country to country, depending on the standard cost of living and local
tax and social security regulations. A monthly mobility allowance will be paid. Depending on marital
status and family situation, an additional monthly family allowance will be paid. The amounts
specified below include both the expected annual gross salary and the annual mobility allowance.
Department of Philosophy, Universitat de Barcelona, Spain
Workpackage: The Sources of Disagreement
Available supervisors (areas):
Manuel García-Carpintero (philosophical disagreements, philosophical method)
Max Kölbel (the semantics of disagreement, ‘faultless disagreement’)
Genoveva Martí (the semantics of disagreement, legal disagreement)
Sven Rosenkranz (peer disagreement, philosophical method)
[wwwadr]
Expected annual gross salary plus mobility allowance: EUR 32,210
Faculty of Philosophy, Ludwig-Maximilians-Universität München,
Germany
Workpackage: Logic and Paradox
Available supervisors (areas):
Hannes Leitgeb (paradoxes of truth and denotation, vagueness, logical revisionism)
[wwwadr]
Expected annual gross salary plus mobility allowance: EUR 35,250
Institute of Philosophy, Université de Neuchâtel, Switzerland
Workpackage: Determinism and Open Choices
Available supervisors (areas):
Fabrice Correia (future contingents, the open future, (in)determinism)
Richard Glauser (free will, esp. in early modern philosophy)
www2.unine.ch/philo/page-6933.html
Expected annual gross salary plus mobility allowance: CHF 47,040
2
Division of Law and Philosophy, School of Arts and Humanities,
University of Stirling, United Kingdom
Workpackage: A Priori Knowledge
Available supervisors (areas):
Crispin Wright (recent scepticism about the a priori, analyticity, knowledge of logic,
Frege, Wittgenstein’s philosophy of mathematics)
Philip Ebert (a priori knowledge, basic knowledge)
Sonia Roca Royes (theories of modality, modal epistemology)
Peter Sullivan (philosophy of logic, early analytic philosophy)
[wwwadr]
Expected annual gross salary plus mobility allowance: GBP 28,688
Department of Philosophy, Stockholms Universitet, Sweden
Workpackage: The Nature of Representation
Available supervisors (areas):
Kathrin Glüer (perception, perceptual content, interface between perception and
cognition, propositional attitudes)
Åsa Wikforss (normativity of meaning/content, internalism/externalism, knowledge of
content, propositional attitudes)
Anandi Hattiangadi (foundational semantics, normativity of meaning/content,
propositional attitudes)
[wwwadr]
Expected annual gross salary plus mobility allowance: EUR 37,200
Stockholms Universitet offers a 4th year of contract to the Early Stage Researchers it
recruits.
Department of Philosophy, University of Edinburgh, United Kingdom
Workpackage: The Structure of Warrant
Supervisors (areas):
Jesper Kallestrup (basic knowledge; metaphilosophy)
Aidan McGlynn (basic knowledge, warrant transmission)
Duncan Pritchard (basic knowledge, warrant transmission, radical scepticism)
[wwwadr]
Expected annual gross salary plus mobility allowance: GBP 28,649
Institut Jean Nicod, École Normale Supérieure, Paris, France
Workpackage: Self-Knowledge
Supervisors (areas):
Jérôme Dokic (feelings, metacognition, and self-knowledge)
Uriah Kriegel (phenomenal consciousness and self-awareness)
Elisabeth Pacherie (agentive self-awareness; practical self-knowledge)
François Recanati (mental indexicality, de se content, and the subjective character of
experience)
Isidora Stojanovic (semantics and pragmatics of first-person speech and thought)
Frédérique de Vignemont (the spatiality and affectivity of self-awareness)
[wwwadr]
Expected annual gross salary plus mobility allowance: EUR 34,112
Successful applicants are expected to bring their doctoral dissertation to near completion within the 3year
	period of their contract. They will receive supervision by experts in their field, be given the
opportunity to present their work-in-progress on occasion of the network’s numerous network events,
and receive complementary skills training designed to further their career perspectives inside and
outside academia.
Successful applicants are expected to spend between 20% and 25% of their employment visiting other
network nodes, including the network’s 5 partner organisations.
Of the network’s 5 partner organisations, 3 belong to the non-academic sector, while 2 belong to the
academic sector with a remit outside academic philosophy. Internships at the network’s partner
organisations, lasting between 1 and 3 months, are mandatory and intended to provide successful
applicants with complementary skills training and insights into other fields of work.
3
Search for Common Ground, Brussels HQ, Belgium
SFCG is an international non-profit organization whose mission is to transform
the way the world deals with conflict away from adversarial approaches
toward cooperative solutions.
[wwwadr]
Ideaborn s.l., Barcelona, Spain
Ideaborn s.l. is an international consultancy firm whose mission
is to promote, and facilitate universal access to, Human Rights.
[wwwadr]
International Catalan Institute for Peace, Barcelona, Spain
ICIP is a public organization whose mission is to promote a culture of peace in
Catalonia and throughout the world, to endorse peaceful solutions and conflict
resolutions and to endow Catalonia with an active role as an agent of peace.
[wwwadr]
United Nations University Institute on Globalization, Culture and
Mobility, Barcelona, Spain
UNU-GCM is a research centre whose mission is to contribute to good governance,
cultural diversity, democracy and human rights through a better understanding of
cultural mobility and diversity in the context of globalization.
[wwwadr]
Academia Europaea Barcelona Knowledge Hub, Barcelona, Spain
AE-BKH is the Southern European and Mediterranean Office of the Academia
Europaea whose mission is to contribute to the consolidation of a genuine European
area of research, education and innovation.
[wwwadr]
Eligibility criteria
Candidates from any country can apply, including non-EU countries. The following eligibility criteria
apply:

	•  completed university studies in philosophy

	•  master degree, or equivalent, by the time of appointment (01.10.2016) *

	•  English language proficiency, in both written and spoken form

	•  3 years prior to appointment the candidate should not have spent more than 12 months in the
country where the recruiting institution is located (mobility requirement)
* The consortium is aware that in certain institutions or systems of higher education, no master
degrees are awarded. The consortium will duly respect this fact in their decision making. Candidates
who hold no master degree but, according to the regulations of their home institution, could embark on
their doctoral dissertation, are encouraged to apply.
Application material
The application package should include all of the following:

	•  cover letter, clearly indicating for which institution/workpackage the application
is intended

	•  updated CV

	•  2 letters of reference

	•  contact details of the 2 referees

	•  writing sample (5,000 words max)

	•  statement of projected doctoral research which bears a recognisable relation to the theme
covered by the relevant workpackage and to one or more of the specific research areas
corresponding to the areas of expertise of the available supervisors (1-2 pages)
4

	•  proof of English language proficiency (written and spoken) *
* If no proof of English language proficiency can be given at the time of application, applicants
commit themselves to supplying such proof in case an offer is made.
Application procedure
Applications are managed centrally. All application material should be sent by email to the network’s
consortium manager at [email].
Referees should send their letters of reference under separate cover by email to the same address
before the deadline, clearly indicating the name of the candidate both in the subject header of their
email and in the attached file name.
If candidates are interested in more than one position, offered by different institutions, they should
submit that number of separate applications with different research statements (each geared to the
respective workpackage). There is no need to ask referees to send their letters more than once.
The consortium strongly encourages applications by female candidates, candidates with disabilities
and members of ethnic minorities.
Deadline
The deadline for applications is 08.02.2016 at noon (CET). Owing to internal UK visa regulations, the
period of application for the posts offered by the Universities of Edinburgh and Stirling is extended to
23.02.2016 at midnight (CET).
Offers are expected to be made no later than 04.03.2016."}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-3-01-2016-03-09003-0-000021440", "text": "Entwicklungsingenieur Automation, Robotik, Systemtechnik (Elektroingenieur, Systemingenieur oder Mechatronikingenieur FH/ETH), Region Glarus-Liechtenstein-Graubünden

Stelleninserat

35248
Firma
Das attraktive Industrieunternehmen realisiert High-Tech Entwicklungsprojekte für anspruchsvolle Auftraggeber. Als Elektroingenieur, Systemingenieur oder Mechatronikingenieur FH/ETH erwartet Sie hier die Möglichkeit, Ihr Wissen auf breiter Basis anzuwenden!
Aufgabengebiet
Gemeinsam mit qualifizierten Kollegen setzen Sie innovative Ideen in neue Produkte, Systeme und Anlagen um. Sie durchlaufen alle Projektphasen vom Konzept bis zur Marktfähigkeit und bewegen sich in spannenden Fachgebieten wie Fertigungs- und Prozessautomatisierung, Sonderanlagenbau, Robotik, Antriebs- und Messtechnik. Ihr Schwerpunkt liegt dabei in der Konzeption und Entwicklung von Hard- und Software. Sind Sie ideenreich und umsetzungsstark? Anforderungsprofil
Sie sind Elektroingenieur, Systemingenieur oder Mechatronikingenieur FH/ETH mit guten Kenntnissen in Antriebstechnik und Hardwarekonzeption. Ferner bringen Sie Praxis in der Steuerungs-/Softwareentwicklung mit und programmieren in SCL, C und C++. Interdisziplinäres Teamwork liegt Ihnen. Sie sind begeisterungsfähig, motiviert und besonders interessiert an Industrieautomatisierung. Und Sie möchten anspruchsvolle Projekte mit neuster Technologie realisieren. Ja? {"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-3-01-2016-03-09010-0-000032322", "text": "RF Engineer

senseFly
Manpower
RF Engineer
Company
	At SenseFly we develop and produce aerial imaging drones for professional applications. Safe, ultra-light and easy to use, these highly automated data collection tools are employed by customers around the world in fields such as surveying, agriculture, GIS, industrial inspection, mining and humanitarian aid.
	SenseFly was founded in 2009 by a team of robotics researchers and quickly became the industry leader in mapping drones. Today we continue to lead the way in developing situationally aware systems that help professionals make better decisions.
Vos tâches

	•  Select, validate and configure data links between future drones and related accessories.

	•  Build functional prototypes and contribute to the testing and development effort.

Profil Recherché

	•  A Master degree in engineering (telecommunications, electrical, radiofrequency, robotics or equivalent) is recommended.

	•  At least 3 years of experience in radio, antenna or telecommunications design, preferably in the domain of robotics or mini-drones.

	•  Knowledge in antenna, radio frequency propagation, telecommunications, radio frequency transceivers.

	•  Experience with spectrum analysers, oscilloscopes, near-field probes

	•  Linux-based programming skills (Bash, C/C++)
Contract: full-time
Start date: Immediately
Location: Cheseaux-sur-Lausanne, Switzerland"}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-3-01-2016-03-09014-0-000019371", "text": "Senior J2EE Developer - COGNIZANT

Senior J2EE Developer

Online Bewerben
Position Information

	Company:
	COGNIZANTLocation:
	Zurich, ZHPosition Type:
	Vollzeit, FestanstellungIndustries:
	Kaufmännische Berufe/Administration/Verwaltung
	IT-Dienstleistungen
	DiverseJob Category:
	IT/TelekommunikationSalary:

About COGNIZANT
Cognizant (NASDAQ: CTSH) is a leading provider of information technology, consulting, and business process outsourcing services, dedicated to helping the world's leading companies build stronger businesses. Headquartered in Teaneck, New Jersey (U.S.), Cognizant combines a passion for client satisfaction, technology innovation, deep industry and business process expertise, and a global, collaborative workforce that embodies the future of work. With over 100 development and delivery centers worldwide and approximately 217,700 employees as of March 31, 2015, Cognizant is a member of the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500, the Forbes Global 2000, and the Fortune 500 and is ranked among the top performing and fastest growing companies in the world.

Job Role:Senior J2EE Developer(Job Number: 00016781351)

Location: Zurich, Switzerland

Description

	Ability to technically analyse a problem, performing high level and low level design including unit and unit-integration testing.
	Ability to design and implement overall Architecture for Integration Layer Components applying the reusable Integration Patterns. Excellent understanding of UML is required.
	Ability to play the role of an overall application owner including the responsibility for documentation, documentation, quality assurance, code review etc. Overall playing the role of tech lead and mentor fellow team members.
	Ability to understand the business requirement very clearly and work very closely with 3rd Party Software Vendors, Offshore Providers, Lead Architects & Business Analysts. Should be able to Treat the business requests with high priority
	Ability to apply a systematic approach to derive the system architecture from the requirements and to define the architecture, so that it provides an input for the implementation and testing.
	Ability to analyse, fix and test production issues.
	Able to learn new technologies quickly and apply those to formulate solution for complex large enterprise applications.
	Able to define standards while adopting new technologies in large enterprise applications.
	Able to help / guide team to adhere to already defined standards. Should be able to ensure that best practices are followed during development.
	Solid experience in JAVA programming language, especially in JAVA Enterprise using Angular JS
	Good exposure to Angular JS. Should have working experience on developing solutions using Angular JS
	Experience in REST service development, JSON concept and integration with knowledge of JAX-RS.
	Communicate in a professional way & appropriate language (distinguish between communication to Business, Management & Engineers & choose the appropriate terminologies)
	Banking domain knowledge.
	Fluent English (verbal as well as written)

Cognizant (NASDAQ: CTSH) is a leading provider of information technology, consulting, and business process outsourcing services, dedicated to helping the world's leading companies build stronger businesses. Visit us online at [wwwadr] or follow us on Twitter: Cognizant.

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-3-01-2016-03-09017-0-000000600", "text": "Business Insights Director EMEA

EMEA Business Insights PositionsSchnellbewerbung
GenSearch
Basel Area, Switzerland

	Vor 2 Tagen veröffentlicht189 Ansichten

Zum Bewerben Mitglied werdenMitglied werden, um sich zu bewerben
Stellenbeschreibung
Positions:
As part of a reorganization within the company, our client is looking to fill various roles within their Business Insights department. Today, the company is seeking to fill the following positions:

	•  Business Insights Director EMEA

	•  Business Insights Manager EMEA

	•  Market Research Manager EMEA

	•  Business Analysis and Forecasting Manager EMEA
The Business Intelligence functions within the company aim to be a trusted business partner to the internal teams by providing actionable, customer-focused insights that lead to a competitive advantage.

Key Responsibilities:

Business Insights Director EMEA

	•  Responsible for the delivery of strategic and tactical insights

	•  Provide the right analytics, insights and recommendation to challenge
and support senior   management in critical decision making

	•  Build and foster a strong network with corporate organization and other regional BI Director

	•  Analytical support to the commercial and therapeutic area (TA) teams.

	•  Establish and manage one of three Centers of Excellence

	•  Leading the Business Insights team for the Central Nervous System and Infectious Disease Therapeutic Area

Business Insights Manager EMEA

	•  Provide the commercial and the brand team with actionable strategic recommendations

	•  Contribute to the short and long term strategy of a TA and specific brands

	•  Plans and coordinates the response to the key strategic questions for the brand/ TA

	•  Acts as an expert in the TA and works closely with market research partners

	•  Champions the development of an integrated Business Intelligence plan

Market Research Manager EMEA

	•  Provide the brand teams with deep insights and actionable recommendations

	•  Plans and coordinates market research activities for his/ her dedicated TA

	•  Coordinate and supervise market research planning and manages market researchers

	•  Key contributor to the activities of the EMEA Market Research Center of Excellence

	•  Oversees the service provided by contracted market researchers and coaches marketing specialists

Business Analysis and Forecasting Manager

	•  Provide the brand teams with deep insights and actionable recommendations derived from descriptive and predictive analytics

	•  Plans and coordinates analytics and forecasting activities for his/ her dedicated TA

	•  Manages Business Analytics Budgets

	•  Key contributor to the activities of the EMEA Analytics and Forecasting Center of Excellence

	•  Develops and/ or maintains TA-level forecasts for the focus area

Positions based across Europe and travel required according to position

4-16 years of experience in business intelligence, market research, AND/OR analytics and forecasting in the healthcare industry
Preferable experience in one or more of the following therapeutic areas:

	•  ncology, hematology, immunology, cardiovascular, metabolism, infectious disease and/or central nervous system
Excellent written and spoken English
Regional and/ or global-level experience
Good communication skills
Team player and business partner
Leadership ability
Strong analytical skills

Branche
Pharmazie sowie Biotechnologie
Beschäftigungsverhältnis
Vollzeit
Berufserfahrung
Mittleres Management
Tätigkeitsbereich
Strategie & Planung,Marketing,Analyst""}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-3-01-2016-03-09018-0-000002978", "text": "E-Discovery Consultant – Forensic Technology and Discovery Services

EY is a global leader in assurance, tax, transaction and advisory services. The insights and quality services we deliver help build trust and confidence in the capital markets and in economies the world over. We develop outstanding leaders who team to deliver on our promises to all of our stakeholders. In so doing, we play a critical role in building a better working world for our people, for our clients and for our communities. Visit us at [wwwadr]

The rapidly growing Forensic Technology & Discovery Services department is currently seeking the right candidate for an excellent career opportunity in the eDiscovery («eD») team in Geneva. Being part of the Fraud Investigation & Dispute Services («FIDS») department, the innovative eD team is involved in conducting investigations into fraudulent behavior and activities of misconduct to prevent or combat fraud, bribery and corruption.

The eD team is a global group of technical specialists that apply technical skills to the full life cycle of data management, including data scoping, processing and analysis, reporting and visualization, as well as presentation for review. This incorporates advanced data analysis technologies such as machine learning, correlation engines, social network analysis, statistical as well as natural language analysis, predictive coding and heavy automation.
Our FTDS data center provides state of the art forensic technology infrastructure and tools necessary to uncover even the most complex cases.

You will have a unique, career changing opportunity to play a key role in the strategy and growth of the eD team.
E-Discovery Consultant – Forensic Technology and Discovery Services
Tasks that you promote

	Working in engagement teams, carrying out both reactive and proactive data analysis of large volumes of unstructured and structured data
	Working with clients, fraud investigators, internal and external auditors, lawyers and regulatory authorities in sensitive and sometimes adversarial situations
	Working in our specialist forensic technology labs and on client site to help clients leverage knowledge from their data through the use of best of breed forensic technologies
	Innovating and developing new methodologies and processes, and bringing solutions to existing and future clients.

Your profile to succeed together

	Degree (Bachelor or Master) in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, or related fields
	Good working experience with SQL and other scripting or programming languages
	Experience in using eDiscovery tools as Relativity, NUIX and additional eDiscovery platforms
	Ideally practical experience in a similar type of work
	Solid knowledge of IT environments, networking, server architecture and IT security
	Excellent problem solving skills and strong analytical and technical skills
	Assertive and proactive approach to the delivery and implementation of projects, as well as the ability to network and build relationships effectively within large organizations and clients
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and French is required – German and any additional language is a plus.

More opportunities for your development
Do you have challenging plans? Stick to them and realize your goals with us! Design your career with EY in a culture that promotes diversity and education, in an environment that constantly opens new doors through knowledge sharing, flexibility and recognition. We offer you to join our highly motivated team of professionals. You will be working and learning in a highly dynamic and cross-functional team - being able to boost your learning curve through the combination of intensive team work, challenging client projects and being part of the network of one of the world's leading professional services firms.
Mila Grieb is looking forward to receiving your application
Do the next step and apply for this position online. Ref No: GEN00076. For further information please contact our recruitment team ([email] / +41 58 286 3366).

Only direct applications will be considered.

Take charge of your career. Now.
[wwwadr]

Apply here        Print"}

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-1-01-2017-03-03112-0-000000373", "text": "Wissenschaftliche/r Mitarbeiter/in

Die Fernfachhochschule Schweiz (FFHS) bietet berufsbegleitende Bachelor-, Master- und
Weiterbildungsstudiengange nach der «Blended Leaming»- Methode an. Ob in Lehre, Forschung oder
Verwaltung - als verantwortungsvolle Arbeitgeberin zählen wir auf engagierte Mitarbeitende,die bereit sind, unsere Vision des zeit- und
ortsunabhängigen Studierens mitzutragen. Das Laboratory für Web Science (LWS) betreibt angewandte Forschung auf den Gebieten
«Data Science» und «Leaming Analytics» und bringt das erworbene Know-how mittels Forschungs- und Dienstleistungsprojekten in

(unmittelbar beim Bahnhof ) per sofort oder nach Vereinbarung zwei neue Mitarbeitende (zu je 80-100%).

sowie Recommender Systems

{"ad_id": "sjmm_suf-2-02-2017-03-00137-0-000003597", "text": "Praktikant, Stufe BSc (m/w)

Praktikant, Stufe BSc (m/w)
Arbeitsort: Wil, Pensum: 100%, Kategorie: Technik
für 3-6 Monate, Beginn nach Vereinbarung 

Innovation, together we do it!

Mit dieser Vision positioniert sich Helbling Technik als langfristiger Partner im Innovationsnetzwerk des Kunden. Gestützt auf leistungsfähige Ingenieurwerkzeuge, moderne Infrastrukturen mit Labors und hoch professionelle Methoden generieren die 340 Ingenieure, Informatiker, Physiker und weiteren Fachkräften von Helbling  Technik innovative Ideen, integrieren State-of-the-art Technologien und entwickeln erfolgreiche Produkte.  

Agile Management, Design Thinking, Lean Innovation! Wir sprechen nicht nur davon, wir tun es täglich. In unserem Entwicklungszentrum in Wil realisieren wir mit unseren 110 Ingenieuren moderne Produkte für weltweitführende, zukunftsorientierte Unternehmen. Unser Geschäftszentrum ist in drei Business Units gegliedert, welche die Bereiche Health Care & Diagnostics, Industries und Beverage Systems abdecken. Während Ihres Praktikums unterstützen Sie uns in einem der spannenden Entwicklungsprojekte. Neben dem Einblick in die technischen Herausforderungen, erhalten und sammeln Sie wertvolle Berufserfahrung in unserem eingespielten Team.

Anforderungen:

Sie haben einen BSc-Abschluss in einer der folgenden Fachrichtungen: 
Electrical Engineering, Information Technology, Software Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Micro Engineering, Robotics oder Biomechanical Engineering.
Sie möchten dieses Wissen in einem Praktikum anwenden und sich dabei in Gebiete wie Antriebstechnik, Sensorik, Geräte-Design, Berechnungen & Simulation, Aufbau-, Inbetriebname- und Tests von Prototypen vertiefen.
Sie sind neugierig, flexibel und zeigen ein Flair für innovative Lösungen.
Es macht Ihnen Spass, Ideen in die Praxis umzusetzen. 
Helbling bietet:

ein motiviertes Team von Entwicklungs-Ingenieuren und Spezialisten
herausfordernde, interdisziplinäre Aufgabenstellungen
ein offenes, kollegiales Umfeld
flexible Arbeitsbedingungen mit vielen Freiheiten moderne Räumlichkeiten an einem zentral gelegenen Arbeitsort
eine hochwertige Projekt-Infrastruktur (Entwicklungstools, Labors, Werkstätten) 
Interessiert?
Gerne überzeugen wir Sie von Helbling!
Wir freuen uns auf Ihre kompletten Bewerbungsunterlagen per E-Mail. 

Wir bitten um Verständnis dafür, dass wir nur Direktbewerbungen berücksichtigen.

Eingetragen am 27.01.2017

Ihr Kontakt
Helbling Technik AG
Frau Fabienne Streule
Hubstrasse 24
9500 Wil
+41719138211
[email]"}
